page.shortlink: api objects security object get users paged method
page.description: Gets a partial list of users one page at a time.
page.prototype: Context.Security.GetUsersPaged as C (PageIndex as N, PageSize as N)

argument.name: PageIndex
argument.description: The one-based index of the page of users to return.

argument.name: PageSize
argument.description: The maximum number of users to return at a time. The last page in the set of pages may have fewer users.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns a crlf delimited string of all the users in the system.

page.discussion: Context.Security.GetUsersPaged() gets a list of all the users one page at a time. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
